title: Zombie Army Trilogy
notes: Game runs fine, but it has a graphical glitch upon startup (in the launch screen). Occasional stuttering.
On first try it had error that 'DirectX11 failed to initialise'. I added 'PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%' to the launch options and it worked without any issue.
title: Zombie Army Trilogy

notes: other than a small graphical glitch with the launcher, you can still click play and the game runs great. no stuttering.
title: Zombie Army Trilogy
